column4: Hey does anyone know how to activate sound for games n such for wine?
anyone know anything about sound support in wine?
/join #wine.  sound works fine for me... probably want to do $ winecfg and set sound to 22050 , OSS, emulation
thanks
noone rly in wine
noone rly in #wine
what is the issue?
oh, it's #winehq, not #wine.
well i get no sound in games at all or in winamp or any sound software for that matter
did you run winecfg?
i ran it and did what you said was your config earlier
... scroll up.
yeah im in winehq just figured you might know
I already told you .. doesn't your client have search ?  OSS, 22050 sampling, "emulation"
For what purpose?  desktop user or ssh?
ssh in particular but learning the way to do it both ways would be exellent
There shouldn't be much of a need for this, really. If you want somethign where user can only upload files, but not use ssh, there is scponly shell
i jsut have a friend of mind who needs ssh access to my system from time to time and he can be a bit of a trickster
then don't give him access.
well hes not malicious or anything its just he can tend to do annoying things n it would be kewl to learn how to restrict access
what you ask is non-trivial.
blast well i hoped it would be simple
